evals.prompt: Please review the PR comments at https://github.com/iguliaev/moneylens/pull/97 and give me a structured report assessing which concerns are valid and proposing fixes.
evals.expected_output: A structured report covering all 8 inline review comments, each assessed as VALID/INVALID/INFORMATIONAL, with proposed fixes for valid ones and suggested PR replies for invalid ones. Includes a prioritized action item list.

assertions.name: Covers all 8 inline comments
assertions.description: The report mentions all 8 inline comments from the PR (soft-delete unique index, budget_categories RLS, budget_tags RLS, budgets_with_linked soft-delete counts, accessibility issue, hard-delete in list.tsx, edit type filter, E2E test coverage)

assertions.name: Each comment labeled VALID, INVALID, or INFORMATIONAL
assertions.description: Every comment in the report has a clear VALID, INVALID, or INFORMATIONAL classification

assertions.name: Proposed fixes include code snippets for valid concerns
assertions.description: Valid concerns are accompanied by concrete code snippets or specific actionable instructions, not just vague advice

assertions.name: Action items section present
assertions.description: The report ends with a prioritized numbered list of action items

assertions.name: References actual file content (not just comments)
assertions.description: The assessment mentions specifics from the actual source files (e.g. migration SQL, tsx component code), showing the skill actually read local files
